descriptionText: Used to draw graphics, on the fly, via scripting
codeText:
<canvas id="canvas-example" style="border: 1px dashed gold; height: 100%; width: 100%;"></canvas>
<script>
  var canvas = document.getElementById( 'canvas-example' );
  var context = canvas.getContext( '2d' );
  context.fillStyle = '#FF9900';
  context.fillRect( 0, 0, context.canvas.clientWidth, context.canvas.clientHeight );
</script>
